alert.note: Alert for Kent (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 28 at 10:14AM EST until February 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Michigan... Grand River near Comstock Park affecting Kent County. ...The Flood Watch is replaced by a River Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan... Maple River at Maple Rapids affecting Clinton County. .Heavy rain fell on a deep primed snowpack leading to the significant snow melt. Flows in rivers may increase quickly and reach critical levels. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Grand River near Comstock Park. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of homes along Abrigador Trail. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:14 AM EST Sunday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr. this morning at 1115 AM EST.
